name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Web Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing robust web infrastructure and enhancing developer experience. Proficient in **TypeScript** and skilled in **gRPC**, with a strong foundation in **dependency management**, **build tooling**, and **SDK development**. Experienced in delivering high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. 
Demonstrated ability in creating documentation that streamlines development and fosters collaboration among teams. Adept in deploying cloud-native applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines. My background also includes building AI/ML-powered platforms that utilize predictive analytics and automation, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
